Content.Text:
<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
And how are you all doing today? It's going to
be very sunny today, so drink up as much of
that light as you can.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
WAH?! <MYNAME>! D-did you hear what I...?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Urk!! This, er...this is all part of a research
experiment. Plants theoretically grow better
when we talk to them, and, ah...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
That look...You don't believe me, do you? In
fact, I bet you think talking to plants is foolish.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Think what you will, I don't care. I didn't expect
to be understood, anyway.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, I must be going. Good day,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_L>A-amazing! To my eye, they truly are looking
slightly better now!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder. Did you learn how to do that from
farming all your different types of crops?
<PAGE>
I think I may need to study this phenomenon in
greater detail.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Er...sorry. I lost myself in my theories for a
moment there. Still, this is very happy news.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Er, I'm happy about the phenomenon we saw,
yes...
<PAGE>
But I'm happier that you believed me, without
doubting or laughing at me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>There are people out there who thoroughly
believe in the efficacy of speaking with plants,
you know.
<PAGE>
And you're not the first bystander to see me
trying it out.
<PAGE>
Most laughed at me, or brushed me off as crazy
for speaking to "inanimate objects."
<PAGE>
But of all of them, you're the first one who
offered to try it yourself, so, er...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L><FACE_LOVE>That made me very happy.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
B-by the way, <MYNAME>, do you have some
free time at the moment?
<PAGE>
I want to see if I can recreate the phenomenon
we just saw, and I would appreciate your help.
